page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: IN OUR SCHOOL WE HAVE 47 CHILDREN. THEY COME FROM THE VILLAGES OF WEST TANFIELD, THORNBOROUGH, NOSTERFIELD AND WELL. MANY CHILDREN TRAVEL BY BUS SOME BY TAXI, SOME BY CAR AND 12 WALK TO SCHOOL. IN THE MORNING WHEN WE COME INTO SCHOOL, WE HAVE ASSEMBLY WHICH IS TAKEN BY THE SCHOLARS OR THE TEACHERS, BUT ON TUESDAYS IT IS TAKEN BY MR EYLES, THE RECTOR. BESIDES THE NORMAL SCHOOL WORK, WE HAVE MANY EXTRA ACTIVITIES. IN THE SUMMER TERM WE HAVE PRIZE GIVING AND BOOKS ARE PRESENTED TO THOSE WHO HAVE DONE GOOD WORK. WE ALSO HAVE A DANCING FESTIVAL AND GARDEN PARTY TOGETHER WITH A SPORTS DAY WITH EVERY CHILD TAKING PART. EACH YEAR THE OLDER CHILDREN ARE TAKEN ON EDUCATIONAL OUTINGS WHICH HAVE INCLUDED TRIPS TO LONDON, CAMPING,HIKING AND EVEN FLYING. THE INFANTS HAVE A HALF DAY OUTING.
